data.name: The Enjenir
data.detailed_description:
As a medieval engineer, you have access to an array of construction materials to design complex structures.


The gridless nature of the building system allows you to create incredibly intricate structures! Once constructed however, realtime and accurate physics is applied...


Use your structures to complete jobs to earn money and construction materials. Will your structures actually remain standing long enough to complete your task?!



Use these earnings to build your dream home/base/castle/fortress. Your only limit is your imagination! (and physics)

Key Features

  • 100% physics driven building system - put your structural engineering skills to the test!
  • 100% physics driven character movement - each limb is controlled by a separate button. Put your hand-eye coordination to the test!
  • Each mission can be solved in an infinite number of ways
  • Create and expand your own base with earnings you make on jobs and missions

data.short_description: In this light hearted physics building game, you are a clumsy medieval engineer. The game combines gridless sandbox building with hilarious physics driven third person controls. With infinite structural design possibilities - the only limit is your imagination‚Ä¶ oh, and gravity!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2-core 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 4-core 2.9 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070, Radeon RX 5700 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
